title: Q2 - What rights do companies have during an investigation â€” can they contest evidence?
description: Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA), organizations under investigation by the Data Protection Board of India (DPBI) enjoy clear procedural and evidentiary rights. The Act explicitly requires that all inquiries follow the principles of natural justice, meaning every company has the right to defend itself, contest evidence, and appeal decisions.
